entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.NET.Build.Tests.GlobalPropertyFlowTests.TestGlobalPropertyFlowInSolution #29478

Closed

  • Wrong path in Microsoft.NET.ApiCompat.targets is preventing ASP.NET Core repo ingesting SDK updates #29451
  • PlatformTarget default value error #29404

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for an explicit interface implementation methods #29471
    Area-GenAPI
  • Convert the DotnetCommand that call "new" to DotnetNewCommand #29470
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add support for default values of methods parameters in the GenAPI. #29356
    Area-GenAPI
  • Update Microsoft.NET.ApiCompat.targets for net8.0 #29450
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • extract common logging functionality into ApiSymbolExtensions #29379
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • Use linker matching TFM #29441
    Area-ILLink
  • Add base class for all test classes using WatchableApp. #29258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix bad merge that incorrectly didn't exclude some packages #29435
    Area-NetSDK
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure
